code: @Test public void testSendMessage() throws Exception { template.sendBody("bean:myBean", "12"). assertEquals("bean ab: " + myBean, "12", myBean.ab). assertEquals("bean abText: " + myBean, "a12", myBean.abText). }
@Override protected Context createJndiContext() throws Exception {     JndiContext answer = new JndiContext().     answer.bind("myBean", myBean).     return answer. }
public void read(@XPath("//a/b/text()") String ab, @XPath(value = "concat('a',//a/b)", resultType = String.class) String abText) {     this.ab = ab.     this.abText = abText. }
